column1: Earlier papers have taken a character-level approach to named entity recognition (NER)
column3: which used prefix and suffix tries
column4: though to our knowledge incorporating all character \x04 - grams is new

column2: in section 4 we add additional features to the maxent model
column3: and chain these models into a conditional markov model (CMM)
column4: as used for tagging CITATION or earlier NER work CITATION
